name: places/ChIJV6o2fffzwokR9OoWiIjuwbs
formattedAddress: 692 W 204th St, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 692 W 204th St, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Amazing Experience, Dr. Samaniego has been able to not just treat my health, he also referred me to other treatments I’ve been due for.  Made me feel comfortable enough to realize my health was in need of other treatments I’ve been postponing; great doctor! Amazing and professional staff.  Down to earth … office was under renovations for a while but in his defense, the company doing the renovations it’s the one at fault for the delay…so worth the wait; the office ambiance is clean and comfortable.  Best doctor experience ever .

originalText.text: Doctor Samaniego---you've been my doctor for almost a decade from the start of your practice in Inwood. I've never had an issue with staff or your expertise and will still choose your practice. I am writing a review because this summer, your staff has rescheduled me twice, one in Sept and one in October for my annual check-up. The sign on the office says renovations will be done by August; however, it wasn't complete in Sept or now Oct. I am fine rescheduling but no one called me both times to notify me. I took days off work and fasted in the morning for my bloodwork. I am surprised by this level of unprofessionalism that can actually be easily remedied by just an easy update notification. I hope you find time to change your door sign and call other patients given the length of the renovation. When I called, a staff member told me they didn't call because they didn't have my phone number. This was never the case for 10 years. Please have the decency communicate with patients. The sign outside your office has been graffitied with August (OF WHAT YEAR), which shows me that other patients are having the same issue. It's a disapointment that you're a wonderful and patient doctor but staff isn't organized with something that can easily be remedied.

originalText.text: Dr. Samaniego has been my best doctor for years he is bilingual and can speak to my latin family.
